Hey insider, you guys are showing Tamil nadu footage for idukki district, my family owns a cardamon plantation in idukki district.The one which you guys are showing is actually tamil nadu, thats a totally different state, even though its near to idukki.
Nevertheless Great video guys, its a very labour intensive job, which requires some recognition like this, thank You.
